modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are met:

notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
* Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the

derived from this software without specific prior written permission.
THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS 'AS IS' AND
ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED

ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT
(INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS

error.name: BUFFERTOOSMALL
error.description: a provided buffer is too small

error.name: COULDNOTLOADLIBRARY
error.description: the library could not be loaded

error.name: COULDNOTFINDLIBRARYEXPORT
error.description: a required exported symbol could not be found in the library

error.name: INCOMPATIBLEBINARYVERSION
error.description: the version of the binary interface does not match the bindings interface

error.name: RTC6_NO_PCIE_CARD_FOUND
error.description: RTC6: No PCIE Card was found

error.name: DELAYSMUSTBEMULTIPLEOF10
error.description: Delays must be a multiple of 10 microseconds

error.name: SCANLABSDKNOTLOADED
error.description: Scanlab RTC has not been loaded

error.name: SCANLABSDKALREADYLOADED
error.description: Scanlab RTC has already been loaded

error.name: CARDALREADYINITIALIZED
error.description: Scanlab RTC card is already initialized

error.name: CARDNOTINITIALIZED
error.description: Scanlab RTC card is not initialized

error.name: LASERINDEXHASNOASSIGNEDSCANNER
error.description: Laser index has no assigned scanner.

error.name: OIEPIDVARIABLEOUTOFBOUNDS
error.description: OIE PID Variable out of bounds.

error.name: TIMELAGMUSTBEAMULTIPLEOF10
error.description: Timelag must be a multiple of 10 microseconds.

error.name: MARKONTHEFLYISDISABLED
error.description: Mark on the fly is disabled

error.name: NOLASERFIELDSET
error.description: No laser field has been set.

error.name: DUPLICATELASERPOWERCALIBRATIONSETPOINT
error.description: Duplicate laser power calibration set point.

error.name: MULTIPLELASERPORTSNOTCOMPATIBLEWITHPID
error.description: Multiple laser ports are not compatible with PID control.

option.name: OIEContinuousMeasurement
option.description: OIE shall continuously record, even if the laser is off. OIE must be enabled before drawing a layer.

option.name: OIEEnableAndContinuousMeasurement
option.description: OIE shall continuously record, even if the laser is off. OIE will be specifically enabled for the layer.

option.name: OIELaserActiveMeasurement
option.description: OIE shall record when the laser is on. OIE must be enabled before drawing a layer.

option.name: OIEEnableAndLaserActiveMeasurement
option.description: OIE shall record when the laser is on. OIE will be specifically enabled for the layer.

struct.name: LaserCalibrationPoint
struct.description: The laser output calibration at a point will be calculated by ((PowerSetPointInPercent + PowerOffsetInPercent) * PowerOutputScaling). The result is clamped to [0, 100]

member.name: PowerSetPointInPercent
member.description: Set point of the power in Percent.

member.name: PowerOffsetInPercent
member.description: Additional offset of the Power value. .

member.name: PowerOutputScaling
member.description: Scaling factor of the laser output. MUST be positive.

functiontype.name: SpatialPowerModulationCallback
functiontype.description: A callback function to modulate laser power depending on the position of the laser.

param.name: StartX
param.description: The X start position of the marking in mm

param.name: StartY
param.description: The Y start position of the marking in mm

param.name: TargetX
param.description: The X target position of the marking in mm

param.name: TargetY
param.description: The Y target position of the marking in mm

param.name: LaserPowerInPercent
param.description: The nominal laser power to be used in percent.

param.name: ModulationType
param.description: A type ID from the build file that specifies the modulation type to use.

param.name: UserData
param.description: Userdata that is passed to the callback function

param.name: AdjustedLaserPowerInPercent
param.description: Returns the adjusted laser power in percent.

method.name: Configure
method.description: Configures a driver with its specific configuration data.

method.name: GetName
method.description: returns the name identifier of the driver

method.name: GetType
method.description: returns the type identifier of the driver

method.name: GetVersion
method.description: returns the version identifiers of the driver

method.name: QueryParameters
method.description: Updates the driver parameters in the driver environment. Should only be called in the driver thread.

method.name: QueryParametersEx
method.description: Updates the driver parameters in the driver environment. Might be called out of thread. Implementation MUST be able to handle parallel calls.

class.name: UARTConnection
class.description: A UART Connection Class. Will receive data into a buffer as long as the instance exists.

method.name: GetBaudRate
method.description: Returns the actual baud rate of the RS232 Interface.

method.name: GetConfiguredBaudRate
method.description: Returns the configured baud rate of the RS232 Interface.

method.name: ClearReceiveBuffer
method.description: Clears the receive buffer.

method.name: AvailableBytes
method.description: Returns the number of currently received bytes.

method.name: WriteString
method.description: Sends a string over the interface. The call is blocking.

method.name: WriteData
method.description: Sends a data buffer over the interface. The call is blocking.

method.name: ReadData
method.description: Blocking call for reading a certain number of bytes. Will remove the bytes from the received buffer. Fails if not enough data is available after the timeout.

method.name: ReadLine
method.description: Blocking call for reading until a line end signature is coming. Fails if timeout is hit or number of bytes have been reached.

param.name: MaxLineLength
param.description: Maximum line length to receive, excluding line separator.

class.name: RTCContext
class.description: Selector of the RTC Controller Card

method.name: LoadFirmware
method.description: Loads card firmware from resource files.

param.name: FirmwareData
param.description: byte array of the firmware program file.

param.name: FPGAData
param.description: byte array of the firmware FPGA file.

param.name: AuxiliaryData
param.description: byte array of the binary auxiliary file.

method.name: LoadCorrectionFile
method.description: Loads card calibration file from given resource file.

param.name: CorrectionFile
param.description: binary data of the correction file.

param.name: Dimension
param.description: Is it a 2D or 3D correction file.

method.name: SelectCorrectionTable
method.description: Selects Correction Table on card.

param.name: TableNumberHeadA
param.description: Table Number for HeadA (1..8) or off (0).

param.name: TableNumberHeadB
param.description: Table Number for HeadA (1..8) or off (0).

method.name: ConfigureLists
method.description: Configures list buffer size.

method.name: SetLaserMode
method.description: Sets laser mode of card.

method.name: DisableAutoLaserControl
method.description: Disables automatic laser control.

method.name: SetLaserControlParameters
method.description: Sets laser control parameters of card.

param.name: PhaseShiftOfLaserSignal
param.description: 180 degree phase shift of Laser signal

param.name: LaserOnSignalLowActive
param.description: Set Laser On Signal Low Active

param.name: LaserHalfSignalsLowActive
param.description: Set Laser Half Signal Low Active

method.name: SetLaserPulsesInBits
method.description: Sets laser control pulse interval (in 1/64th microseconds)

method.name: SetLaserPulsesInMicroSeconds
method.description: Sets laser control pulse interval (in microseconds)

method.name: SetStandbyInBits
method.description: Sets standby pulse interval (in 1/64th microseconds)

method.name: SetStandbyInMicroSeconds
method.description: Sets laser control pulse interval (in microseconds)

method.name: GetIPAddress
method.description: Returns the IP Address of the RTC Card. Fails if driver has not been initialized.

method.name: GetNetmask
method.description: Returns the Netmask of the RTC Card. Fails if driver has not been initialized.

method.name: GetSerialNumber
method.description: Returns serial number of card

method.name: GetLaserIndex
method.description: Returns the laser index assigned to the card. This is the laser index that will be used to map the toolpath laser data to the according device.

method.name: SetLaserOrigin
method.description: Sets the laser origin in absolute coordinates. This origin will be used to relatively position lasers to one another.

param.name: OriginX
param.description: Sets laser origin X coordinate of the laser in mm. All laser movements will be moved by that minus that amount in X.

param.name: OriginY
param.description: Sets laser origin Y coordinate of the laser in mm. All laser movements will be moved by that minus that amount in X.

method.name: GetLaserOrigin
method.description: Returns the laser origin in absolute coordinates. This origin will be used to relatively position lasers to one another.

param.name: OriginX
param.description: Laser origin X coordinate of the laser in mm. All laser movements will be moved by that minus that amount in X.

param.name: OriginY
param.description: Laser origin Y coordinate of the laser in mm. All laser movements will be moved by that minus that amount in X.

method.name: SetLaserField
method.description: Sets the laser field limits in absolute coordinates.

param.name: MinX
param.description: Sets minimum laser X coordinate in mm.

param.name: MinY
param.description: Sets minimum laser Y coordinate in mm.

param.name: MaxX
param.description: Sets maximum laser X coordinate in mm.

param.name: MaxY
param.description: Sets maximum laser Y coordinate in mm.

method.name: ResetLaserField
method.description: Resets the laser field to default values.

method.name: EnableRangeChecking
method.description: Enables range checking of the laser field. A laser field MUST have been set before.

method.name: DisableRangeChecking
method.description: Disables range checking of the laser field.

method.name: GetLaserField
method.description: Returns the laser field limits in absolute coordinates.

param.name: MinX
param.description: Sets minimum laser X coordinate in mm.

param.name: MinY
param.description: Sets minimum laser Y coordinate in mm.

param.name: MaxX
param.description: Sets maximum laser X coordinate in mm.

param.name: MaxY
param.description: Sets maximum laser Y coordinate in mm.

param.name: HasLaserField
param.description: Returns true if a laser field has been set.

method.name: SetStartList
method.description: Opens the list to write

method.name: SetEndOfList
method.description: Closes the currently open list

method.name: ExecuteList
method.description: Executes the list

method.name: SetAutoChangePos
method.description: Sets the AutoChange Position of the currently not running list.

method.name: SetDelays
method.description: Sets the laser delays

param.name: MarkDelay
param.description: Mark delay in microseconds (MUST be multiple of 10)

param.name: JumpDelay
param.description: Jump delay in microseconds (MUST be multiple of 10)

param.name: PolygonDelay
param.description: Polygon delay in microseconds (MUST be multiple of 10)

method.name: SetLaserDelaysInMicroseconds
method.description: Sets the laser delays (on the list)

method.name: SetLaserDelaysInBits
method.description: Sets the laser delays (on the list)

method.name: DrawPolyline
method.description: Writes a polyline into the open list

method.name: DrawPolylineOIE
method.description: Writes a polyline into the open list with OIE Enabled.

param.name: OIEPIDControlIndex
param.description: OIE PID Control Index. 0 disables PID Control, MUST be smaller or equal 63.

method.name: DrawHatches
method.description: Writes a list of hatches into the open list

method.name: AddSetPower
method.description: adds a power change to the open list. MUST NOT be used for PID control.

method.name: AddSetPowerForPIDControl
method.description: adds a base power change to the open list. If using PID control, this base power will be used at starting power when the laser is turned on.

method.name: AddSetJumpSpeed
method.description: adds a jump speed change to the open list

method.name: AddSetMarkSpeed
method.description: adds a mark speed change to the open list

method.name: AddJumpMovement
method.description: Adds a Jump movement to the open list

method.name: AddMarkMovement
method.description: Adds a Mark movement to the open list

method.name: AddTimedMarkMovement
method.description: Adds a timed Mark movement to the open list

param.name: DurationInMicroseconds
param.description: Duration of mark movement in Microseconds.

method.name: AddFreeVariable
method.description: Adds a free variable set to the open list

method.name: GetCurrentFreeVariable
method.description: Returns the currently set free variable.

method.name: GetTimeStamp
method.description: Returns the current RTC time stamp.

method.name: StopExecution
method.description: Stops the execution of the current list immediately.

method.name: DrawHatchesOIE
method.description: Writes a list of hatches into the open list with OIE Enabled.

param.name: OIEPIDControlIndex
param.description: OIE PID Control Index. 0 disables PID Control, MUST be smaller or equal 63.

method.name: AddLayerToList
method.description: Adds a layer instance to the current open list.

param.name: Layer
param.description: Instance of the layer to add to the lists.

param.name: FailIfNonAssignedDataExists
param.description: If true, fails if there is a laser index that does not match.

method.name: WaitForEncoderX
method.description: Adds a command to wait for the encoder for reaching an X axis position. Fails if Mark on the Fly is not enabled.

param.name: PositionInMM
param.description: Position Value to reach in mm.

param.name: InPositiveHalfPlane
param.description: If true, waits for the encoder reaching a value that is larger than PositionInMM. If false, waits for the encoder reaching a value that is smaller than PositionInMM.

method.name: WaitForEncoderY
method.description: Adds a command to wait for the encoder for reaching an Y axis position. Fails if Mark on the Fly is not enabled.

param.name: PositionInMM
param.description: Position Value to reach in mm.

param.name: InPositiveHalfPlane
param.description: If true, waits for the encoder reaching a value that is larger than PositionInMM. If false, waits for the encoder reaching a value that is smaller than PositionInMM.

method.name: WaitForEncoderXSteps
method.description: Adds a command to wait for the encoder for reaching an X axis position. Fails if Mark on the Fly is not enabled.

param.name: PositionInSteps
param.description: Position Value to reach in steps.

param.name: InPositiveHalfPlane
param.description: If true, waits for the encoder reaching a value that is larger than PositionInMM. If false, waits for the encoder reaching a value that is smaller than PositionInMM.

method.name: WaitForEncoderYSteps
method.description: Adds a command to wait for the encoder for reaching an Y axis position. Fails if Mark on the Fly is not enabled.

param.name: PositionInSteps
param.description: Position Value to reach in steps.

param.name: InPositiveHalfPlane
param.description: If true, waits for the encoder reaching a value that is larger than PositionInMM. If false, waits for the encoder reaching a value that is smaller than PositionInMM.

method.name: AddCustomDelay
method.description: Adds a custom delay to the list

param.name: DelayInMicroseconds
param.description: Custom delay value in microseconds (MUST be multiple of 10)

method.name: GetCorrectionFactor
method.description: Returns correction factor of Card Calibration (in bits per mm)

method.name: GetStatus
method.description: Returns status of list execution

method.name: GetHeadStatus
method.description: Returns status of scan head

method.name: GetStateValues
method.description: Returns status values of scan head

method.name: GetInputPointer
method.description: returns current input list position

param.name: Position
param.description: Returns current position of open list

method.name: GetRTCVersion
method.description: Returns version information of the RTC Card

method.name: SetCommunicationTimeouts
method.description: Set RTC Ethernet communication timeouts

method.name: GetCommunicationTimeouts
method.description: Get RTC Ethernet communication timeouts

method.name: InitializeForOIE
method.description: Initializes the RTC card for the open interface extension. MUST be called before the OIE is initialized.

param.name: SignalChannels
param.description: Array of signal channels. MUST NOT be empty

method.name: SetLaserPinOut
method.description: Sets the laser pin outputs to a certain state. Control command, has immediate effect.

method.name: GetLaserPinIn
method.description: Read the laser pin input values. Control command, has immediate effect.

method.name: AddLaserPinOutToList
method.description: Adds the laser pin command to the current open list.

method.name: EnableOIE
method.description: Writes an OIE enabling command block to the open list.

method.name: DisableOIE
method.description: Writes an OIE disabling command block to the open list.

method.name: StartOIEMeasurement
method.description: Writes an OIE measurement start command block to the open list. Same as StartOIEMeasurement with false as parameter.

method.name: StartOIEMeasurementEx
method.description: Writes an OIE measurement start command block to the open list, with parameterized LaserOn Trigger

param.name: LaserOnTrigger
param.description: If true, only triggers a measurement, when the laser is on.

method.name: StopOIEMeasurement
method.description: Writes an OIE measurement start command block to the open list.

method.name: SetOIEPIDMode
method.description: Sets OIE PID Index.

param.name: OIEPIDIndex
param.description: OIE PID Index. MUST be between 0 and 63. 0 means PID disabled.

method.name: EnableOIEPIDControl
method.description: Enables OIE PID Control. Affects only subsequent layers that are drawn into lists.

method.name: DisableOIEPIDControl
method.description: Disables OIE PID Control.

method.name: ClearOIEMeasurementTags
method.description: Clears all stored OIE Measurement tags of the context. New Tag Indices will start from 0 again.

method.name: EnableOIEMeasurementTagging
method.description: Enables OIE Measurement tagging.

method.name: DisableOIEMeasurementTagging
method.description: Disables OIE Measurement tagging.

method.name: MapOIEMeasurementTag
method.description: Maps an OIE Measurement tag back to the original scan parameters.

param.name: MeasurementTag
param.description: Measurement Tag that has been sent to the OIE.

method.name: DisableSkyWriting
method.description: Disable skywriting.

method.name: EnableSkyWritingMode1
method.description: Enables skywriting on the list in mode 1. See Scanlab RTC Documentation for details.

method.name: EnableSkyWritingMode2
method.description: Enables skywriting on the list in mode 2. See Scanlab RTC Documentation for details.

method.name: EnableSkyWritingMode3
method.description: Enables skywriting on the list in mode 3. See Scanlab RTC Documentation for details.

method.name: EnableSkyWritingMode4
method.description: Enables skywriting on the list in mode 4. See Scanlab RTC Documentation for details.

method.name: SetTransformationAngle
method.description: Sets the transformation angle of the scan field.

method.name: SetTransformationScale
method.description: Sets the transformation scale of the scan field.

param.name: ScaleFactor
param.description: Scale Factor (1.0 is no scaling). Allowed value is -16 to 16.

method.name: SetTransformationOffset
method.description: Sets the transformation offset of the scan field.

method.name: SetTransformationMatrix
method.description: Sets the transformation matrix of the scan field.

param.name: M11
param.description: Upper left field of the transformation matrix

param.name: M12
param.description: Upper right field of the transformation matrix

param.name: M21
param.description: Lower left field of the transformation matrix

param.name: M22
param.description: Lower right field of the transformation matrix

method.name: PrepareRecording
method.description: Prepares recording of position data of the RTC Card. This needs to be called before any list is started.

method.name: EnableRecording
method.description: Enables recording of position data of the RTC Card. This is a list command.

method.name: DisableRecording
method.description: Disables recording of position data of the RTC Card. This is a list command.

method.name: ExecuteListWithRecording
method.description: Executes the list with recording the position data from the RTC card.

method.name: EnableTimelagCompensation
method.description: Enables timelag compensation.

param.name: TimeLagXYInMicroseconds
param.description: Time lag of XY axes (in microseconds). MUST be a multiple of 10.

param.name: TimeLagZInMicroseconds
param.description: Time lag of Z axis (in microseconds). MUST be a multiple of 10.

method.name: DisableTimelagCompensation
method.description: Disables timelag compensation.

method.name: EnableMarkOnTheFly2D
method.description: Enables mark on the fly 2D. This is a list command.

param.name: ScaleXInMMperEncoderStep
param.description: Scale factor X in mm per encoder step

param.name: ScaleYInMMperEncoderStep
param.description: Scale factor Y in mm per encoder step

method.name: DisableMarkOnTheFly2D
method.description: Disable mark on the fly 2D. This is a list command.

method.name: MarkOnTheFly2DIsEnabled
method.description: Returns if mark on the fly 2D has been enabled.

param.name: IsEnabled
param.description: Returns true if mark on the fly 2D is enabled.

method.name: Get2DMarkOnTheFlyPosition
method.description: Returns 2D mark on the fly position.

param.name: PositionX
param.description: Mark on the fly position X

param.name: PositionY
param.description: Mark on the fly position Y

method.name: CheckOnTheFlyError
method.description: Checks mark on the fly error.

param.name: FailIfError
param.description: If true, the call will fail in case of an error.

param.name: ErrorCode
param.description: Bitfield corresponding to the get_marking_info call, as described in the RTC SDK Documentation.

method.name: LaserPowerCalibrationIsEnabled
method.description: Returns if the laser power calibration table is non-empty.

method.name: LaserPowerCalibrationIsLinear
method.description: Returns if the laser power calibration table has one entry.

method.name: ClearLaserPowerCalibration
method.description: Clears the laser power calibration table.

method.name: GetLaserPowerCalibration
method.description: Returns the laser power calibration table. Fails if laser calibration is not enabled.

method.name: SetLinearLaserPowerCalibration
method.description: Enables the laser power calibration with an affine linear tranformation.

param.name: PowerOffsetInPercent
param.description: Additional offset of the Power value.

param.name: PowerOutputScaling
param.description: Scaling factor of the laser output.

method.name: SetPiecewiseLinearLaserPowerCalibration
method.description: Enables the laser power calibration with multiple calibration point values. Table MUST NOT have negative power entries. Laser Power Output will be linear scaled with the given values within their respective intervals. Any laser power outside of the minimum or maximum Power values will be scaled according to the respective minimum or maximum scaling value.

param.name: CalibrationPoints
param.description: Laser Calibration Points. Array will be sorted by Laser Power Keys. Array MUST NOT be empty. Array MUST NOT have duplicate entries (to an accuracy of 0.01 Percent).

method.name: EnableSpatialLaserPowerModulation
method.description: Enables a spatial laser power modulation via callback.

param.name: ModulationCallback
param.description: Callback to call for modulating the laser power.

param.name: UserData
param.description: Userdata that is passed to the callback function

method.name: DisablePowerModulation
method.description: Disables all power modulation functions.

method.name: EnableLineSubdivision
method.description: If this function is enabled, all mark lines will be subdivided so that the maximum length is small than the threshold.

method.name: DisableLineSubdivision
method.description: Disables the subdivision of mark lines.

method.name: ReadMultiMCBSP
method.description: Reads a multi MCBSP register from the RTC Card. Should be used only for debugging purposes.

param.name: RegisterNo
param.description: Number of the register to read.

method.name: CreateUARTConnection
method.description: Creates a new UART Connection. Closes any other one that might be active.

param.name: DesiredBaudRate
param.description: Desired baud rate. 160 Bd12.8 MBd. The other RS-232 interface parameters cannot be altered (data bits: 8, start bits: 1, stop bits: 1, parity: none).

method.name: EnableScanAhead
method.description: Enables the Scanahead mode of the RTC card.

method.name: DisableScanAhead
method.description: Disables the Scanahead mode of the RTC card.

method.name: ActivateScanAheadAutoDelays
method.description: Activates the ScanAhead Auto Delays.

method.name: DeactivateScanAheadAutoDelays
method.description: Deactivates the ScanAhead Auto Delays.

method.name: ScanAheadAutoDelaysAreActivated
method.description: Returns if ScanAhead Auto Delays are activated.

param.name: Activated
param.description: Returns true if Auto Delays are activated.

method.name: SetScanAheadLaserShiftsInMicroseconds
method.description: Enables the Scanahead mode of the RTC card.

param.name: LaserOnShiftInMicroSeconds
param.description: Laser on shift in Microseconds. Will be rounded to 64th microseconds.

param.name: LaserOffShiftInMicroSeconds
param.description: Laser off shift in Microseconds. Will be rounded to 64th microseconds.

method.name: SetScanAheadLaserShiftsInUnits
method.description: Enables the Scanahead mode of the RTC card.

param.name: LaserOnShift
param.description: Laser on shift in Units, which are 1/64th of a Microsecond.

param.name: LaserOffShift
param.description: Laser on shift in Units, which are 1/64th of a Microsecond.

method.name: SetScanAheadLineParameters
method.description: Controls the Scanahead Line parameters.

param.name: CornerScale
param.description: Corner sharpness scale in Percent.. 100 percent means sharp corners. Values above 100 will be clipped to 100.

param.name: EndScale
param.description: Line end sharpness scale in Percent.. 100 percent means straight line ends. Values above 100 will be clipped to 100.

param.name: AccelerationScale
param.description: Fraction of active laser time (not path lenght) during acceleration in Percent.. 100 percent means sharp corners. Values above 100 will be clipped to 100.

method.name: SearchCards
method.description: Searches Ethernet Cards

param.name: Count
param.description: Returns how many ethernet cards have been found.

method.name: SearchCardsByRange
method.description: Searches Ethernet Cards

param.name: Count
param.description: Returns how many ethernet cards have been found.

method.name: GetCardCount
method.description: Returns number of detected Cards

param.name: Count
param.description: Returns how many cards have been found.

method.name: GetEthernetCardCount
method.description: Returns number of found ethernet cards

param.name: Count
param.description: Returns how many ethernet cards have been found.

method.name: AcquireCard
method.description: Acquires a card and returns an RTCContext instance.

param.name: Number
param.description: Number of Card (1-based). Must be between 1 and CardCount.

method.name: AcquireCardBySerial
method.description: Acquires a card and returns an RTCContext instance.

method.name: AcquireEthernetCard
method.description: Acquires an ethernet card and returns an RTCContext instance.

param.name: Number
param.description: Number of Card (1-based). Must be between 1 and EthernetCardCount.

method.name: AcquireEthernetCardBySerial
method.description: Acquires an ethernet card and returns an RTCContext instance.

class.name: Driver_ScanLab
class.description: A LaserScanner Driver for a ScanLAB card.

method.name: LoadSDK
method.description: Initializes the ScanLab SDK.

method.name: LoadCustomSDK
method.description: Initializes the ScanLab SDK from an external source.

method.name: CreateRTCSelector
method.description: Creates and initializes a new RTC selector singleton. Should only be called once per Process.

method.name: EnableJournaling
method.description: Enables journaling of the SDK. MUST be called before LoadSDK or LoadCustomSDK.

class.name: Driver_ScanLab_RTC6
class.description: A LaserScanner Driver for a single laser ScanLAB RTC6 card.

method.name: SetToSimulationMode
method.description: Turns the driver into a simulation mode.

method.name: IsSimulationMode
method.description: Returns if the driver is in simulation mode.

param.name: SimulationModeEnabled
param.description: Flag if driver is in simulation mode.

method.name: IsInitialized
method.description: Returns if the driver is initalized.

method.name: Initialise
method.description: Manually initializes the RTC6 Scanner Driver.

param.name: IP
param.description: IP Network Address. Empty string for local card.

param.name: Netmask
param.description: IP Netmask Address. Empty string for local card.

method.name: InitialiseFromConfiguration
method.description: Initializes the RTC6 Scanner Driver from a configuration preset. Calls Initialise, LoadFirmware, SetCorrectionFile, ConfigureLaserMode and ConfigureDelays.

method.name: SetCommunicationTimeouts
method.description: Set RTC Ethernet communication timeouts

method.name: GetIPAddress
method.description: Returns the IP Address of the RTC Card. Fails if driver has not been initialized.

method.name: GetNetmask
method.description: Returns the Netmask of the RTC Card. Fails if driver has not been initialized.

method.name: GetSerialNumber
method.description: Returns the Serial Number of the RTC Card. Fails if driver has not been initialized.

method.name: GetContext
method.description: Returns the RTC Context Instance. Fails if it card has not been initialised.

method.name: GetSelector
method.description: Returns the RTC Selector Instance. Fails if it card has not been initialised.

method.name: LoadFirmware
method.description: Loads the firmware from the driver resources.

param.name: FirmwareResource
param.description: resource name of the firmware program file.

param.name: FPGAResource
param.description: resource name of the firmware FPGA file.

param.name: AuxiliaryResource
param.description: resource name of the binary auxiliary file.

method.name: LoadCustomFirmware
method.description: Loads the firmware from custom resources.

param.name: FirmwareData
param.description: byte array of the firmware program file.

param.name: FPGAData
param.description: byte array of the firmware FPGA file.

param.name: AuxiliaryData
param.description: byte array of the binary auxiliary file.

method.name: SetCorrectionFile
method.description: Sets the correction file stream.

param.name: CorrectionFile
param.description: binary data of the correction file.

param.name: Dimension
param.description: Is it a 2D or 3D correction file.

method.name: ConfigureLaserMode
method.description: Configures the laser mode. MUST be called before any exposure.

param.name: PhaseShiftOfLaserSignal
param.description: 180 degree phase shift of Laser signal

param.name: LaserOnSignalLowActive
param.description: Set Laser On Signal Low Active

param.name: LaserHalfSignalsLowActive
param.description: Set Laser Half Signal Low Active

method.name: ConfigureDelays
method.description: Configures the default laser and scanner delays. ATTENTION: Will create and overwrite execution list 1!

param.name: MarkDelay
param.description: Mark delay in microseconds (will be rounded to a multiple of 10)

param.name: JumpDelay
param.description: Jump delay in microseconds (will be rounded to a multiple of 10)

param.name: PolygonDelay
param.description: Polygon delay in microseconds (will be rounded to a multiple of 10)

method.name: SetOIERecordingMode
method.description: Sets the recording mode for using the Open Interface extension. Will be taken into account by DrawLayer. Default is No Recording.

method.name: GetOIERecordingMode
method.description: Returns the recording mode for using the Open Interface extension, taking into account by DrawLayer. Default is No Recording.

method.name: EnableAttributeFilter
method.description: Enables filtering of the segments by segment attributes. A segment will only be drawn if the given integer attribute has the given value.

param.name: NameSpace
param.description: Namespace of Attribute to filter for.

param.name: AttributeName
param.description: Name of Attribute to filter for.

method.name: DisableAttributeFilter
method.description: Disables filtering of the segments by segment attributes.

method.name: DrawLayer
method.description: Draws a layer of a build stream. Blocks until the layer is drawn.

param.name: StreamUUID
param.description: UUID of the build stream. Must have been loaded in memory by the system.

param.name: LayerIndex
param.description: Layer index of the build file.

method.name: GetCommunicationTimeouts
method.description: Get RTC Ethernet communication timeouts

method.name: EnableTimelagCompensation
method.description: Enables timelag compensation.

param.name: TimeLagXYInMicroseconds
param.description: Time lag of XY axes (in microseconds). MUST be a multiple of 10.

param.name: TimeLagZInMicroseconds
param.description: Time lag of Z axis (in microseconds). MUST be a multiple of 10.

method.name: DisableTimelagCompensation
method.description: Disables timelag compensation.

class.name: Driver_ScanLab_RTC6xN
class.description: A LaserScanner Driver for multiple synchronized ScanLAB RTC6 cards.

method.name: SetToSimulationMode
method.description: Turns the driver into a simulation mode.

method.name: IsSimulationMode
method.description: Returns if the driver is in simulation mode.

param.name: SimulationModeEnabled
param.description: Flag if driver is in simulation mode.

method.name: IsInitialized
method.description: Returns if all the scanners of the driver are initalized.

method.name: ScannerIsInitialized
method.description: Returns if a specific scanners of the driver are initalized.

param.name: ScannerIndex
param.description: Index of the scanner (0-based). MUST be smaller than ScannerCount

method.name: GetScannerCount
method.description: Returns if number of scanners.

param.name: NumberOfScanners
param.description: Number of scanners supported by this driver.

method.name: InitialiseScanner
method.description: Initializes one of the RTC6 Scanner Drivers.

param.name: ScannerIndex
param.description: Index of the scanner (0-based). MUST be smaller than ScannerCount

param.name: IP
param.description: IP Network Address. Empty string for local card.

param.name: Netmask
param.description: IP Netmask Address. Empty string for local card.

param.name: LaserIndex
param.description: Associated Laser Index from the toolpath data. 1-based, MUST NOT be 0. Each Scanner MUST own a unique laser index.

method.name: InitialiseScannerFromConfiguration
method.description: Initializes the RTC6 Scanner Driver from a configuration preset. Calls Initialise, LoadFirmware, SetCorrectionFile, ConfigureLaserMode and ConfigureDelays.

param.name: ScannerIndex
param.description: Index of the scanner (0-based). MUST be smaller than ScannerCount

method.name: GetIPAddress
method.description: Returns the IP Address of the RTC Card. Fails if driver has not been initialized.

param.name: ScannerIndex
param.description: Index of the scanner (0-based). MUST be smaller than ScannerCount

method.name: GetNetmask
method.description: Returns the Netmask of the RTC Card. Fails if driver has not been initialized.

param.name: ScannerIndex
param.description: Index of the scanner (0-based). MUST be smaller than ScannerCount

method.name: GetSerialNumber
method.description: Returns the Serial Number of the RTC Card. Fails if driver has not been initialized.

param.name: ScannerIndex
param.description: Index of the scanner (0-based). MUST be smaller than ScannerCount

method.name: GetLaserIndex
method.description: Returns associated Laser Index from the toolpath data.

param.name: ScannerIndex
param.description: Index of the scanner (0-based). MUST be smaller than ScannerCount

param.name: LaserIndex
param.description: Associated Laser Index from the toolpath data.

method.name: GetSelector
method.description: Returns the RTC Selector Instance. Fails if it card has not been initialised.

method.name: GetContext
method.description: Returns the RTC Context Instance. Fails if it card has not been initialised.

param.name: ScannerIndex
param.description: Index of the scanner (0-based). MUST be smaller than ScannerCount

method.name: DrawLayer
method.description: Draws a layer of a build stream on List 1. Blocks until the layer is drawn. Laser Indices are automatically assigned. Will fail if

param.name: StreamUUID
param.description: UUID of the build stream. Must have been loaded in memory by the system.

param.name: LayerIndex
param.description: Layer index of the build file.

param.name: FailIfNonAssignedDataExists
param.description: If true, the call will fail in case a layer contains data that is not assigned to any defined scanner card.

param.description: Time lag of XY axes (in microseconds). MUST be a multiple of 10.

param.name: TimeLagZInMicroseconds
param.description: Time lag of Z axis (in microseconds). MUST be a multiple of 10.

method.description: Acquires shared ownership of an Instance
